Summary: I was watching this strange object in the sky looked like a blimp it disappeared.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Charlotte
There were no other sightings in Charlotte on or around June 7th 2012
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: sighting detailsi was at the lake alliance in potterville\charlotte mi. i was in the parking lot of the disc golf and my boyfriend was talking to these people i was in the car and i remember looking at the sky and it started doing all this weird pulsating patterns. i thought i was tripping out or had low blood sugar or my contacts needed to be washed. i looked at the man my boyfriend was talking to and next to his head i seen an object in the sky. it was very strange i went thru in my mind all the things that it could be. it was not an airplane it stayed in one spot and shifted in kind of like a square pattern, i wanted to show the people i was with but i didnt want to take my eyes off of it and when i finally did it disappeard.
